sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Title from '../components/Common/Title/Title' export default function DonationModal(props) { return ( </Modal.Title> </Modal.Header> <Modal.Body> <h4>Centered Modal</h4> <p> Cras mattis consectetur purus sit amet fermentum. Cras justo odio, dapibus ac facilisis in, egestas eget quam. Morbi leo risus, porta ac consectetur ac, vestibulum at eros. </p> </Modal.Body> <Modal.Footer> <Button onClick={props.onHide}>Close</Button> </Modal.Footer> </Modal> ); }
